text: Danny Facey is a Grenadian international footballer who plays for English club Albion Sports, as a striker. ==Career== Facey scored nine goals in five games for Towngate, and moved from Bradford Park Avenue to Ossett Town in January 2011. In July 2015 he joined Brighouse Town, returning to Albion Sports in July 2016. Facey made his international debut for Grenada in 2011. ==Personal life== He is the younger brother of Delroy Facey and cousin to Anthony Griffith. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Grenadian footballers Category:Grenada international footballers Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Ossett Town F.C. players Category:Brighouse Town F.C. players Category:Albion Sports A.F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Danny Facey
